title: Peyton's Places
overview: Peyton's Places offers a fun, insightful tour through 100 years of football, following the sport and the league's rise to an American cultural touchstone. For nearly a year, Manning has crisscrossed the country, visiting the people and places that have played an important part in the making of the NFLâ€”highlighting memorable events, teams, players, and trends over the past century.
